Why ROSOL?
  • One of the India's largest network for solar power palnt installation
  • MNRE: channel Partner
  • ISO 9001:2015 certified
  • MSME certified
  • 100+ Projects Execution experience in past with almost all major and minor developers

  • 30+ In-House trained professionals team members to complete the service at the earliest.
  • 100% assurance for Zero Damage in Installation & Commissioning
  • 100% assurance for completion of project in given time
  • Experience of all types of roofs or surface solar power project
  • 24/7 total control of plant status
